price: Nígbà náà, Òjíṣẹ́ Allāhu sọ fún wọn pé: “(Ẹ fi) abo ràkúnmí Allāhu àti omi rẹ̀ (sílẹ̀).”
arabic: فَقَالَ لَهُمۡ رَسُولُ ٱللَّهِ نَاقَةَ ٱللَّهِ وَسُقۡيَٰهَا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: faqāla lahum rasūlu al-lahi nāqata al-lahi wasuq'yāhā
